variation: Full process automation with 4 load cell interfaces, 5 pneumatic gates, 4 motor assemblies (2 standard, 2 VFD), remote HMI, and pressurization for Class II Div II

parts.description: Signal conditioner w/ peak, gross, net logic
K600 Pneumatic gate solenoids + prox sensors
Silo and Mill Chain Disk Motors
Batch Hopper and Hammer Mill VFDs (Ethernet + STO)
Secondary enclosure w/ Ethernet switch, E-stop, control LED
Class II Div II pressurization system

notes: This GHAC panel features full process automation, including batch monitoring, trend logging, VPN remote access, and recipe tracking. Includes remote HMI with pressure-rated enclosure, designed with future silo expansion in mind. Load cells and pneumatic gates interface with 24VDC logic. Panel adheres to UL508a, with MCC and REM CAD sets provided.
